title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs on macOS/Linux with a single CLI, pull/run GGUF models, REST API, and built-in model library (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models; sync & async clients; streamed responses.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers: same features as Python SDK, zero native deps, ESM/CJS bundles.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration: ChatOllama & OllamaLLM wrappers, tool calling, JSON mode, embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: chat UI, model management, multi-user, RAG, open-source alternative to ChatGPT UI.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama: chat, generate, pull, list, delete, streaming; Android compatible.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST API: simple chat & generate, streaming support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI chat built on ollama-js: REPL, conversation history, markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension: use any Ollama model as inline GitHub Copilot replacement with custom prompts.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot: slash commands, thread-based chats, model switching, moderation hooks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, PVC, and service exposure.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: RAG with Chroma, function calling, fine-tune LoRA adapters, LangGraph agents.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama: reproducible builds, CUDA/OpenCL acceleration, declarative service.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate: async client for Ollama REST API, tokio & serde, includes examples.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama: chat & generate, streaming via IAsyncEnumerable, strongly-typed payloads.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app: side-by-side model comparison, parameter sliders, session memory.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin: generate summaries, rewrite notes, or Q&A using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app: mentions trigger Ollama responses, thread retention, per-channel model prefs.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform Qt desktop GUI for Ollama: system tray, markdown chat, model manager.
